message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm only willing to pay $95 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $105.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product. It's the maximum I can afford.
I understand you're trying to be fair, Bob, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to compromise again and sell the product to you for $102.50.
